original_title: Ney Matogrosso - Canto em Qualquer Canto
overview: This album was recorded live in December 2004 at SESC Pinheiros to celebrate the anniversary of the Channel "Canal Brazil". Ney Matogrosso presents a eclectic repertory which include his greatest hits and who received new arrangements with instrumentalists chosen by him, forming a suit of plucked strings of the highest quality.
title: Ney Matogrosso - Canto em Qualquer Canto
